message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this reflects the significant benefits you'll gain from owning it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, I understand your desire to work within a budget.  While your offer is appreciated, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is my best offer and reflects a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
